official_title: A bill to convey certain lands and to remove certain restrictions from certain previous conveyances of lands in Custer County, Montana.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior to: (1) convey specified lands by patent to Miles City, Montana; and (2) nullify provisions limiting the use and prohibiting the transfer of lands previously conveyed to Miles City and Custer County. Requires any patent issued pursuant to such conveyances to contain a reservation to the United States of all mineral rights of such lands.

titles.title: A bill to convey certain lands and to remove certain restrictions from certain previous conveyances of lands in Custer County, Montana.
